title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 349-1.6 - Payment of bills for treatment or services
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 349-1.6 - Payment of bills for treatment or services

State Regulations

Bills for therapy treatment or services shall be
submitted by a self-employed therapist to the employer or carrier together with
a copy of the prescription or referral by the authorized physician or in the
case of physical therapy, authorized physician or authorized podiatrist, including directions as to treatment, if any. Controversies as to the
reasonable value of such charges shall be determined by an arbitration
committee in accordance with section
13-g
of the Workers' Compensation Law and the rules thereunder. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
349-1.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
